node.page:
[{usergroupmultipleadd}]

Title

[{textfield:title}]

Moderator Type

[% my %valueList = ('0' => 'Single Moderator', '1' => 'Multiple Moderator'); my @list = keys(%valueList); $query->popup_menu('usergroup_modtype', \@list, $$NODE{modtype}, \%valueList); %]

Join Type

[% my %valueList = ('0' => 'Open to All', '1' => 'User Request', '2' => 'Moderator Only'); my @list = keys(%valueList); $query->popup_menu('usergroup_jointype', \@list, $$NODE{jointype}, \%valueList); %]

[% $query->checkbox('usergroup_messageArchive',$$NODE{messageArchive},1,'Archive messages?'); %]

Recommendation Link (aka Weblog Link)

[{textfield:recommendationLink}]

Usergroup Lineup Info (255 char. max)

[{textarea:shortdesc,4,40}]

Usergroup Doctext

[{textarea:doctext}]
node.title: usergroup edit page
